LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Kern.title: Epona Peasant Rebel
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Kern.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fed up with a poor life under oppression and took up weapons.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Farmer.title: Epona Freed Serf
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Farmer.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a serf. Originally, it was a subordinate of the lord, but it recently gained freedom.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_FreeFarmer.title: Epona Yeoman
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_FreeFarmer.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is yeoman. I inherited my parents' class. Fortunately, parents were free people.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_SmartFarmer.title: Epona Smart Serf
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Innkeeper.title: Epona Innkeeper
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Innkeeper.baseDesc: "Come on in. We got warm food, warm drinks, and warm beds."
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_DesertedLevy.title: Epona Deserted Levy
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_DesertedLevy.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a deserted conscript soldier. It's an unfair case that I was forcibly dragged in the first place.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_LowFallenNoble.title: Epona Fallen Noble
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_LowFallenNoble.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fallen noble. I'm barely living on various battlefields. It just doesn't smell like a noble.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Brigand.title: Epona Brigand
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Brigand.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] firmly changed his mind and decided to quit bandits and find a new life.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_WanderDoctor.title: Epona Wandering Doctor
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_WanderDoctor.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wanders around the kingdom, receives a price, and performs surgery or prescriptions. Even without professional knowledge.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Carpenter.title: Epona Carpenter
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Carpenter.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has the construction technology. They mainly built farmers' houses or barns.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Blacksmith.title: Epona Blacksmith
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Blacksmith.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]was running a blacksmith in a small Epona village.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Labour.title: Epona Craftsman
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Stonemason.title: Epona Stonemason
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Stonemason.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran mason who has designed a noble stone castle.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Poacher.title: Epona Poacher
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Poacher.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] often sneaked into the lord's forest and hunted good prey.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Cavalry.title: Epona Cavalry
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Cavalry.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has served and trained as a Cavalry all of life.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_LightCavalry.title: Epona Light Cavalry
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_LightCavalry.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has served and trained as a Skirmisher all of life.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Varangian.title: Epona Retired Imperial soldier
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Varangian.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] received systematic training in the empire. And learned a little bit of imperial etiquette.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_MidFallenNoble.title: Epona Petty Noble
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_MidFallenNoble.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a noble of a very weak family. which had to live whole life in the war zone.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Noble.title: Epona Royal Noble
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Noble.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an aristocrat. It grows up in the royal palace and has a particularly high nose.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Scholar.title: Epona Scholar
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Warlord.title: Epona Warlord
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Farmer.title: Epona Farmer's child
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Farmer.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child of an ordinary farmer. it have been working hard since it was young.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Thief.title: Epona Roamer
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Thief.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bad boy who was Roaming.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Forager.title: Epona Gatherer
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Forager.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child of an ordinary farmer. I lived by collecting various things from mountains and fields.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Shepherd.title: Epona Shepherd
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Shepherd.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a shepherd. It had to protect the sheep from wolves with staff. But the amount was so huge that nothing particularly difficult happened.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Wildhorse.title: Epona Wildhorse
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Wildhorse.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned when it was young and grew up in the wild. At some point, was raised by priests and socialized.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Blacksmith.title: Epona Blacksmith's Apprentice
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Blacksmith.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a blacksmith's assistant. It grew up next to the blacksmith in the village receiving apprenticeship education.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Thug.title: Epona Bully
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Thug.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a strong child in the village.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Squire.title: Epona Squire
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Squire.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] as been trained as a knight's squire.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Burgher.title: Epona Burgher
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Soldier.title: Epona Child Soldier
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Soldier.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a juvenile soldier. It is common in medieval and ealry modern societies such as Eponish.
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Noble.title: Epona Noble
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Student.title: Epona Academician
LanguageData.Epona_Child_Student.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a student at the academy. Attending the Academy is a great privilege in Epona society.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Witch.title: Epona Witch
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Witch.baseDesc: Q : So, why do witches burn?. A : Cuz they're made of... wood?
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Toy.title: Epona Toy
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Toy.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave to a nobleman who had a lot of money.
LanguageData.Epona_Adult_Inquisition.title: Epona Inquisitor
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Doc.title: Uniponen Doctor
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Doc.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few really good doctors in the Kingdom of Epona.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_FieldDoc.title: Uniponen Fieldmedic
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_FieldDoc.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a field surgeon. It is one of the really important talents needed by the Epona Corps because you can get high-quality medicines anytime, anywhere.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Paladin.title: Uniponen Paladin
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Priest.title: Uniponen Wandering Priest
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Priest.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a noble monk. For some reason, he wandering around and living.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Mage.title: Uniponen Mage
LanguageData.Unicorn_Adult_Mage.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is called a wizard. Some are proficient in various techniques, but the biggest reason is that [PAWN_nameDef] is Uniponen.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Commoner.title: Child of Divine message
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Commoner.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is Uniponen, who was born after the oracle. He believed in the rumor that Unifonen's touch had healing powers and had a busy day because of the people who came to him for healing.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Herb.title: Uniponen Herbalist
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Herb.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has a great talent for finding or growing herbs.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Priest.title: Uniponen Monastery kid
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Priest.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] played the cutie in the monastery.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Doc.title: Uniponen Doctor's apprentice
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Doc.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is the doctor's apprenticeship. We mainly supplied antibacterial agents using Alicorn.
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Paladin.title: Uniponen Paladin's Squire
LanguageData.Unicorn_Child_Paladin.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the servant of the paladin. Learned field first aid and basic weapon skills.
